sentence: In March 2021, Twitter temporarily restricted Ohio U.S. Senate candidate Josh Mandel in Match for violating the social media platform's rules.
author: Charlotte Trattner
title: Ohio Bill Could Make It Easier to Sue Social Media Companies Over Censorship

sentence: Mr. Greitens, who is running for Missouri’s open Senate seat, will deliver remarks on Friday, along with GOP Senate candidates Josh Mandel of Ohio and Adam Laxalt of Nevada, a former state attorney general.
author: Mica Soellner
title: Disgraced ex-Missouri Gov. Eric Greitens to speak at CPAC

sentence: If Your Time is short Not a scrap of evidence has emerged to support Josh Mandel’s assertion of a stolen election.
author: Jon Greenberg
title: Ohio’s Josh Mandel repeats false claim of stolen 2020 election
